name: Another Day at The Park
description:
"We were all having a good time until you showed up. You can't just go around eating people.You should be ashamed of yourself. Luckily, we have the police and the military on our side." - Some Guy you ate

Controls

Arrow keys or virtual d-pad to move

Space or Red button to transform

Click on Werewolf for AOE attack

Hints

Eat to survive

You take damage if you are shot or ran over in Beast form

Updates

8/23/15

New menu and Death screen

2 new enemy classes

>Rogue werewolves

>Swat

Airstrikes

Note from Dev

Because this is a beta, I will be constantly updating this game.This means that this game could drastically change in between updates .
